title: Walk on walls/ceiling
description: For the next 20 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor. For the next 20 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor.

title: Speed
description: For the next 2 seconds the time flows 100 times slower for you, so it feels to you like 3 minutes.

title: Small Fireball
description: Deals 3 damage. Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source.
